abstract: Vows column on wedding of Helene Gayle and Stephen Keith.

headline.print_headline: Sharing Ideals and, at Long Last, a Wedding Day
headline.main: Sharing Ideals, Friendship and, After 37 Years, a Wedding Day

snippet: Two doctors who had known each other for decades finally decided to let their hearts take the lead.
lead_paragraph: Two doctors who had known each other for decades finally decided to let their hearts take the lead.
